item.title: Remembering Coin Castle Casino: A Vintage Fremont Street Gem | Las Vegas History
item.description:
A Castle of Coins on Fremont Street

The Fremont Street Experience is undeniably a Vegas institution today, but for decades, it was a different beast â€“ a grittier, more character-driven scene dominated by small casinos, each vying for attention. Among those memorable spots was the Coin Castle Casino, a quirky and spirited fixture from 1970 to 1999. It wasn’t a sprawling mega-resort, but what it lacked in size, it more than made up for in personality.
